text: The Scootsurance travel insurance, underwritten by MSIG Insurance, provides various benefits including personal accident, medical, and travel inconvenience coverage, with limitations and maximum payable limits varying by age and type of benefit. The policy has certain exclusions and conditions, and customers can make claims directly with MSIG. The insurance offers a range of benefits, including emergency medical evacuation and repatriation, with some benefits having a "Covered" status without a specified maximum limit.
